_header: Three things it been that I hold price

OxfPem258.Transcription:
þre þingges it ben þat I holde prisþe ton is to
                    be war þe toþer is to be wysþe þridde to love þe
                    lawe þat in þe lond is
OxfPem258.Editions:
Heffernan,  Thomas J. 
             “Unpublished Middle English Verses on ‘The Three Sorrowful
                Things.’” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         83 (1982): 31-3: 33.
